pageProps.data:
## Concat ###### Description Concat two inputs in one image ###### Params | Param | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | |**tA**|[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)|The first input| |**tB**|[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)|The second input| |**mask?**|Array.\|Array that should describe the needed output.
This should be an array of strings in format "{number of input}.{vector component}",
see example for more.

⚠️ STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT (EXPERIMENTAL, API COULD BE CHANGED OR DEPRECATED)| ###### Example ```js gm.concat(inputImage1, inputImage2, ['1.r', '1.g', '2.b', '2.a']); ```
